issue.title: Sim ignores velocity limits from URDF

content.raw: Proposal for limiting velocity using [<velocity>](http://gazebosim.org/sdf/1.3.html#velocity) is to stop `SetForce` from applying additional forces if a joint has surpassed its velocity limit.  This is purely artificial, and will not stop numerical instabilities from exploding.  See [pull request #301](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/301/enforce-joint-velocitylimit/diff), thoughts?
content.html: Proposal for limiting velocity using <velocity> is to stop SetForce from applying additional forces if a joint has surpassed its velocity limit. This is purely artificial, and will not stop numerical instabilities from exploding. See pull request #301, thoughts?
